Structs/PostgreSQLAlterTable/DropAction..name: ifExists
Structs/PostgreSQLAlterTable/DropAction..abstract: If true, no error will be thrown if the entity does not exist.

Structs/PostgreSQLAlterTable/DropAction..name: identifier
Structs/PostgreSQLAlterTable/DropAction..abstract: Name of the constraint or column to drop.

Structs/PostgreSQLAlterTable/DropAction..name: DropAction
Structs/PostgreSQLAlterTable/DropAction..abstract: DROP [ COLUMN ] [ IF EXISTS ] column_name [ RESTRICT | CASCADE ]

Structs/PostgreSQLDatabaseConfig.html#/s.name: database
Structs/PostgreSQLDatabaseConfig.html#/s.abstract: Optional database name to use during authentication.

Structs/PostgreSQLDatabaseConfig.html#/s.name: transportConfig
Structs/PostgreSQLDatabaseConfig.html#/s.abstract: Configures how data is transported to the server. Use this to enable SSL.

Structs/PostgreSQLData.html#/s:10Postgre.name: binary
Structs/PostgreSQLData.html#/s:10Postgre.abstract: Binary-formatted Data. nil if this data is null or not binary formatted.

Structs/PostgreSQLData.html#/s:10Postgre.name: text
Structs/PostgreSQLData.html#/s:10Postgre.abstract: Text-formatted String. nil if this data is null or not text formatted.

Structs/PostgreSQLData.html#/s:10Postgre.name: decode(_:)
Structs/PostgreSQLData.html#/s:10Postgre.abstract: Gets a String from the supplied path or throws a decoding error.

Structs/PostgreSQLResultFormat.html#/s:1.name: text
Structs/PostgreSQLResultFormat.html#/s:1.abstract: Request all of the results in a specific format.

Structs/PostgreSQLResultFormat.html#/s:1.name: binary
Structs/PostgreSQLResultFormat.html#/s:1.abstract: Request all of the results in a specific format.

Structs/PostgreSQLResultFormat.html#/s:1.name: unspecified
Structs/PostgreSQLResultFormat.html#/s:1.abstract: Let the server decide the formatting options.

Structs/PostgreSQLDataFormat.html#/s:10P.name: raw
Structs/PostgreSQLDataFormat.html#/s:10P.abstract: The raw data type code recognized by PostgreSQL.

Structs/PostgreSQLDataFormat.html#/s:10P.name: knownSQLName
Structs/PostgreSQLDataFormat.html#/s:10P.abstract: Returns the known SQL name, if one exists.

Structs/PostgreSQLError.html.name: PostgreSQLError
Structs/PostgreSQLError.html.abstract: Errors that can be thrown while working with PostgreSQL.

Protocols/PostgreSQLDataTypeStaticRepres.name: postgreSQLDataType
Protocols/PostgreSQLDataTypeStaticRepres.abstract: Appropriate PostgreSQL column type for storing this type.

Extensions/SQLInsertBuilder.html#/s:3SQL.name: returning(_:)
Extensions/SQLInsertBuilder.html#/s:3SQL.abstract: Adds a RETURNING expression to the insert query.

Extensions/SQLInsertBuilder.html#/s:3SQL.name: onConflict(_:set:)
Extensions/SQLInsertBuilder.html#/s:3SQL.abstract: Adds an ON CONFLICT ... DO UPDATE SET clause to the insert.

Extensions/String/convertFromPostgreSQLD.name: PostgreSQLNumericMetadata
Extensions/String/convertFromPostgreSQLD.abstract: Represents the meta information preceeding a numeric value.

Extensions/String/convertFromPostgreSQLD.name: ndigits
Extensions/String/convertFromPostgreSQLD.abstract: The number of digits after this metadata

Extensions/String/convertFromPostgreSQLD.name: weight
Extensions/String/convertFromPostgreSQLD.abstract: How many of the digits are before the decimal point (always add 1)

Extensions/String/convertFromPostgreSQLD.name: sign
Extensions/String/convertFromPostgreSQLD.abstract: If 1, this number is negative. Otherwise, positive.

Extensions/String/convertFromPostgreSQLD.name: dscale
Extensions/String/convertFromPostgreSQLD.abstract: The number of sig digits after the decimal place (get rid of trailing 0s)

Extensions/ChannelPipeline.html#/s:3NIO1.name: addPostgreSQLClientHandlers(first:)
Extensions/ChannelPipeline.html#/s:3NIO1.abstract: Adds PostgreSQL message encoder and decoder to the channel pipeline.

Extensions/Dictionary.html#/s:s10Diction.name: firstValue(tableOID:name:)
Extensions/Dictionary.html#/s:s10Diction.abstract: Accesses the first value from this dictionary with a matching field name.

Classes/PostgreSQLConnection/TransportCo.name: cleartext
Classes/PostgreSQLConnection/TransportCo.abstract: Does not attempt to enable TLS (this is the default).

Classes/PostgreSQLConnection/TransportCo.name: unverifiedTLS
Classes/PostgreSQLConnection/TransportCo.abstract: Enables TLS requiring a minimum version of TLS v1.1 on the server, but disables certificate verification.

Classes/PostgreSQLConnection/TransportCo.name: standardTLS
Classes/PostgreSQLConnection/TransportCo.abstract: Enables TLS requiring a minimum version of TLS v1.1 on the server.

Classes/PostgreSQLConnection/TransportCo.name: modernTLS
Classes/PostgreSQLConnection/TransportCo.abstract: Enables TLS requiring a minimum version of TLS v1.2 on the server.

Classes/PostgreSQLConnection/TransportCo.name: edgeTLS
Classes/PostgreSQLConnection/TransportCo.abstract: Enables TLS requiring a minimum version of TLS v1.3 on the server.

Classes/PostgreSQLConnection/TableNameCa.name: tableName(oid:)
Classes/PostgreSQLConnection/TableNameCa.abstract: Fetches the table name for a given table OID. Returns nil if no table with that OID is known.

Classes/PostgreSQLConnection/TableNameCa.name: tableOID(name:)
Classes/PostgreSQLConnection/TableNameCa.abstract: Fetches the table OID for a given table name. Returns nil if no table with that name is known.

Classes/PostgreSQLConnection.html#/s:10P.name: authenticate(username:database:password:)
Classes/PostgreSQLConnection.html#/s:10P.abstract: Authenticates the PostgreSQLClient using a username with no password.

Classes/PostgreSQLConnection.html#/s:10P.name: connect(to:transport:on:)
Classes/PostgreSQLConnection.html#/s:10P.abstract: Connects to PostgreSQL server specified by a ServerAddress.

Classes/PostgreSQLConnection.html#/s:10P.name: listen(_:handler:)
Classes/PostgreSQLConnection.html#/s:10P.abstract: Begins listening for notifications on a channel.

Classes/PostgreSQLConnection.html#/s:10P.name: notify(_:message:)
Classes/PostgreSQLConnection.html#/s:10P.abstract: Sends a notification to a listening connection. Use in conjunction with listen(...).

Classes/PostgreSQLConnection.html#/s:10P.name: query(_:_:)
Classes/PostgreSQLConnection.html#/s:10P.abstract: Runs a query, returning each row to the supplied handler.

Classes/PostgreSQLConnection.html#/s:10P.name: query(_:resultFormat:_:)
Classes/PostgreSQLConnection.html#/s:10P.abstract: Runs a parameterized Query, returning each row of the results to the supplied handler one at a time.

Classes/PostgreSQLConnection/ServerAddre.name: ServerAddress
Classes/PostgreSQLConnection/ServerAddre.abstract: Specifies how to connect to a PostgreSQL server.

Classes/PostgreSQLConnection.html#/s:10P.name: simpleQuery(_:)
Classes/PostgreSQLConnection.html#/s:10P.abstract: Performs a non-parameterized (text protocol) query to PostgreSQL.

Classes/PostgreSQLConnection.html#/s:10P.name: simpleQuery(_:_:)
Classes/PostgreSQLConnection.html#/s:10P.abstract: Performs a non-parameterized (text protocol) query to PostgreSQL.

Classes/PostgreSQLConnection/TableNameCa.name: TableNameCache
Classes/PostgreSQLConnection/TableNameCa.abstract: Caches table OID to string name associations.

Classes/PostgreSQLConnection.html#/s:10P.name: tableNames()
Classes/PostgreSQLConnection.html#/s:10P.abstract: Fetches a struct that can convert table OIDs to table names.

Classes/PostgreSQLConnection/TransportCo.name: TransportConfig
Classes/PostgreSQLConnection/TransportCo.abstract: Transport-layer security configuration for the PostgreSQL connection.

Classes/PostgreSQLDatabase.html.name: PostgreSQLDatabase
Classes/PostgreSQLDatabase.html.abstract: Creates connections to an identified PostgreSQL database.

Classes/PostgreSQLProvider.html.name: PostgreSQLProvider
Classes/PostgreSQLProvider.html.abstract: Provides base PostgreSQL services such as database and connection.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
